amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to clarify in law the difference between internal and external transfers when applying for an emergency transfer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Johnson (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
